channel.title: Need a teacher =D please help

item.title: Need a teacher =D please help
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

PATH

C:\Program Files\PHP\;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\;

classpath

.;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0\lib\ext\QTJava.zip;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

i think it should be that

i had to think of it for a sec becuase thats what works for jdk6.2

item.title: Need a teacher =D please help
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

you only habe 6.0? you shoulda told me earlier. DISREGARD

[quote=“hippie, post:4, topic:131684”]http://java.about.com/gi/dynamic/offsite.htm?site=http://www.java.net/download/jdk6/binaries/
That is for jdk6.2
After you download it
in you PATH and class path variables, change the Jdk and Jre accordingly to 6.0_02
Also in your compile change the Jdk and Jre accordingly.

EDIT
Infact. ill Post Mod T’s compiler and a runserver edited to run with jdk 6.2[/quote]

please

ill give you the PATH and class path in a sec

Read full topic

item.title: Need a teacher =D please help
item.dc:creator: @jackeychan jackeychan
item.description:
@jackeychan wrote:

THANKS HIPPIE! its good that some people actually help =D i just went to system info and environment then added path and classpath things im not sure if it was for 6.0 or for 6.2 cause i only got 6.0 jdk

                                                    EDIT

how to change it accordingly to 6.2 ? ill post what i got right now and u tell me please CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;. and C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin

Read full topic

item.title: Need a teacher =D please help
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

http://java.about.com/gi/dynamic/offsite.htm?site=http://www.java.net/download/jdk6/binaries/
That is for jdk6.2
After you download it
in you PATH and class path variables, change the Jdk and Jre accordingly to 6.0_02
Also in your compile change the Jdk and Jre accordingly.

EDIT
Infact. ill Post Mod T’s compiler and a runserver edited to run with jdk 6.2

Read full topic
